name: Gmail Hide Inbox (#)
description: Makes the little inbox entry go away, including its boldness and unread count, so that when you're not in your inbox, you don't get distracted by it. To get back to your inbox, you have to use the keyboard shortcut g-i (press G, then I). Or just open a new tab and type gmail.com.
